price: Saa Da no, yεde mobεba (mo Wura Nyankopͻn anim), na momu biara asumasεm nsuma.
arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ تُعۡرَضُونَ لَا تَخۡفَىٰ مِنكُمۡ خَافِيَةٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: yawma-idhin tuʿ'raḍūna lā takhfā minkum khāfiyatun
